# LIGO Gravitational Wave Tutorial — HW3

Welcome! This site contains my HW3 for Stats 159/259, built with [MyST](https://mystmd.org/).

## Launch the notebook on Binder

[![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/UCB-stat-159-f25/hw3-Arhaan2/HEAD?urlpath=lab/tree/LOSC_Event_tutorial.ipynb)

- The repository includes an `environment.yml` so Binder can reproduce the environment.
- Data is under `data/`, figures under `figures/`, and audio under `audio/`.

## Contents

- **Notebook:** See the “LOSC_Event_tutorial.ipynb” tab in the nav.
- **Repo:** <https://github.com/UCB-stat-159-f25/hw3-Arhaan2>
